scripts.build-todo-item: npx vue-cli-service build --target wc --name todo-item src/todo-item.vue --dest build/todo-item
scripts.build-todo-input: npx vue-cli-service build --target wc --name todo-input src/todo-input.vue --dest build/todo-input
scripts.build-my-todo: npx vue-cli-service build --target wc --name my-todo src/my-todo.vue --dest build/my-todo
scripts.concat-js: npx concat-cli -f build/todo-item/todo-item.min.js build/todo-input/todo-input.min.js build/my-todo/my-todo.min.js -o dist/build.js
scripts.build: npm run minify-html && npm run build-todo-item && npm run build-todo-input && npm run build-my-todo && npm run concat-js && npm run minify-js && rm -rf build
